description: Built with their most advanced thermal-reflective tech, this parka packs a lot of heat into an active, adventure-ready essential.  The waterproof outer shell shuts out storms and showers without sacrificing breathability.  Enjoy an extra layer of warmth and comfort with 650 fill power down insulation.
name: Columbia Sportswear Landroamer Down Parka - Mens

specs.value: 650 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified
